Based on your preference for a heist film set in 1979, I'd recommend "The Town". It stars Ben Affleck and Jeremy Renner, following a group of thieves who rob a bank and hold an assistant manager hostage. Things get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with her. If you're up for a bit of romance mixed with high-stakes crime, this could be right up your alley!

As for another suggestion that might appeal to you, "Amelia" is a biographical film about legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart. Starring Hilary Swank and Richard Gere, it offers a fascinating look into the life of a remarkable woman who attempted a flight around the world before disappearing over the Pacific Ocean in 1937. If you enjoy historical films or are interested in stories about strong female characters, you might find "Amelia" captivating as well.
